scripts.build: npm run build-all && npm run build-player_api
scripts.build-all: ./node_modules/.bin/yuglify src/third-party/json2.js src/core/prelude.js src/core/json.js src/common/array.js src/core/cookie.js src/core/event.js src/core/init.js src/core/epilogue.js src/core/qs.js src/core/api.js src/core/auth.js src/core/player.js -c build/all
scripts.build-player_api: ./node_modules/.bin/yuglify src/core/prelude.js src/common/array.js src/core/player.js src/core/epilogue.js src/core/qs.js -c build/player_api
